description:
Helps in decision making by weighing arguments
Write down pros and cons, then weigh all arguments and get a recommendation based on this Time Article:
http://time.com/3772262/billionaire-trick-for-decisions/

This is open source:
https://github.com/markusfisch/Libra

Please report bugs here:
https://github.com/markusfisch/Libra/issues
